# General =====

  * **Type:** - Matrix Processing
  * **Heading:** - Annot. rows
  * **Source code:** [ManageNumericalAnnotRow.cs](https://github.com/JurgenCox/perseus-plugins/blob/master/PerseusPluginLib/AnnotRows/ManageNumericalAnnotRow.cs)

===== Brief description =====

Add or edit numerical annotation rows. This could for instance 
define the times of samples for time series data.

Output: Same matrix with numerical annotation row added or modified.
